languages.text: "Их кровавый танец больше похож на марш. И все же я чувствую родство в том, как мы казним неугодных Неумирающему".

traits.locale_text: "Их кровавый танец больше похож на марш. И все же я чувствую родство в том, как мы казним неугодных Неумирающему".

languages.text: "Their dance of blood is more akin to a march. And yet, I sense a kinship in our drive to execute those who offend the Undying Emperor."
languages.original_text: "Их кровавый танец больше похож на марш. И все же я чувствую родство в том, как мы казним неугодных Неумирающему".

traits.locale_text: "Their dance of blood is more akin to a march. And yet, I sense a kinship in our drive to execute those who offend the Undying Emperor."
"Their dance of blood is more akin to a march. And yet, I sense a kinship in our drive to execute those who offend the Undying Emperor."

"Their dance of blood is more akin to a march. And yet, I sense a kinship in our drive to execute those who offend the Undying Emperor."
"Their dance of blood is more akin to a march. And yet, I sense a kinship in our drive to execute those who offend the Undying Emperor."

languages.text: 「彼らの血の舞は、むしろ行進に近い。だがそれでも、不敬なる者を不死の皇帝の名のもとに処刑しようとする衝動という点では、どこか共感を覚えるな」
languages.original_text: "Their dance of blood is more akin to a march. And yet, I sense a kinship in our drive to execute those who offend the Undying Emperor."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らの血の舞は、むしろ行進に近い。だがそれでも、不敬なる者を不死の皇帝の名のもとに処刑しようとする衝動という点では、どこか共感を覚えるな」

languages.text: "Ihr Bluttanz gleicht eher einem Marsch. Und doch spüre ich eine Verwandtschaft in unserem Drang, jeden hinzurichten, der den Todlosen Imperator beleidigt."
languages.original_text: "Their dance of blood is more akin to a march. And yet, I sense a kinship in our drive to execute those who offend the Undying Emperor."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr Bluttanz gleicht eher einem Marsch. Und doch spüre ich eine Verwandtschaft in unserem Drang, jeden hinzurichten, der den Todlosen Imperator beleidigt."

languages.text: « Leur danse du sang s'apparente davantage à une marche militaire. Cela dit, je sens une affinité dans notre volonté d'exécuter ceux qui offensent l'Empereur Immortel. »
languages.original_text: "Their dance of blood is more akin to a march. And yet, I sense a kinship in our drive to execute those who offend the Undying Emperor."

traits.locale_text: « Leur danse du sang s'apparente davantage à une marche militaire. Cela dit, je sens une affinité dans notre volonté d'exécuter ceux qui offensent l'Empereur Immortel. »

languages.text: «Su danza de sangre se asemeja más a una marcha. Aun así, percibo cierta afinidad en nuestro deseo de ejecutar a quienes agravian al Emperador Inmortal».
languages.original_text: "Their dance of blood is more akin to a march. And yet, I sense a kinship in our drive to execute those who offend the Undying Emperor."

traits.locale_text: «Su danza de sangre se asemeja más a una marcha. Aun así, percibo cierta afinidad en nuestro deseo de ejecutar a quienes agravian al Emperador Inmortal».

languages.text: “他们的鲜血之舞更像是某种进行曲。不过，我们都渴望处决那些冒犯不死神皇的亵渎者，我在这其中感受到了相似之处。”
languages.original_text: "Their dance of blood is more akin to a march. And yet, I sense a kinship in our drive to execute those who offend the Undying Emperor."

traits.locale_text: “他们的鲜血之舞更像是某种进行曲。不过，我们都渴望处决那些冒犯不死神皇的亵渎者，我在这其中感受到了相似之处。”

languages.text: "Kan dansları, daha çok yürüyüşe benziyor. Yine de Ölmeyen İmparator'a karşı gelenleri katletme arzumuz, bizi yakınlaştırıyor."
languages.original_text: "Their dance of blood is more akin to a march. And yet, I sense a kinship in our drive to execute those who offend the Undying Emperor."

traits.locale_text: "Kan dansları, daha çok yürüyüş gibi. Yine de Ölmeyen İmparator'a karşı gelenleri katletme arzumuz, bizi yakınlaştırıyor."

languages.original_text: "Their dance of blood is more akin to a march. And yet, I sense a kinship in our drive to execute those who offend the Undying Emperor."
